title: A BOC user will see a blue notification when I place a player on the Restricted List from a Submitted Voluntarily Retired List transaction
custom_preconds: GIVEN a user is a BOC user
custom_steps:
WHEN the user has clicked on the "Place on Restricted List" button on a Voluntarily Retired transaction
AND the following have all occurred successfully:  
     - Reject the Place on Voluntarily Retired transaction. 
     - Create and approve a Place on Restricted List transaction for the player with a placement date = the placement date from the Place on Voluntarily Retired transaction and a "Reason for Placement" of "Failure to submit Voluntarily Retired Letter"
     - Add the comment "Player originally placed on VR list by club." to the Restricted List transaction. 
     - Load the Place on Restricted List transaction for the player in view mode.
custom_expected:
THEN the system will display a blue notification stating that the Voluntarily Retired transaction was rejected 
AND the Restricted List transaction was approved.

title: Being Reinstated from IL will reinstate a player from all Inactive Lists
custom_preconds: GIVEN a player has one or more inactive list status'
custom_steps: WHEN  a player is reinstated from the Inactive List
custom_expected:
THEN they will be reinstated from ALL inactive lists
AND moved back to the roster status that they had prior to being placed on an Inactive List
